sql_create_table.sql_create: create table log_sheet(id integer primary key autoincrement,prj_code varchar, prj_name varchar,prj_site varchar,original varchar,apparatus_name1 varchar, apparatus_name2 varchar,apparatus_code1 varchar,apparatus_code2 varchar, detection_standard varchar,detection_date varchar,point_name varchar, workload varchar,detection_method varchar,detection_map varchar, group_leader varchar,group_mumber1 varchar,group_member2 varchar,remark varchar ,date varchar);
